snippet: Mr. Hills, who has been at the organization for almost 30 years, said he wanted to “embark on a new mission” when he leaves at the end of the year.
abstract: Washington Post president and general manager Stephen P Hills will resign at end of 2015 after almost 30 years with organization.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hills, who has been at the organization for almost 30 years, said he wanted to “embark on a new mission” when he leaves at the end of the year.

headline.main: Washington Post President Stephen Hills to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; The Washington Post President to Step Down
